p:
Model simulations include the CMIP5 multi-model ensemble
45 (the r1i1p1 member only, 37 models with monthly data and 34 with daily data), CESM1 large ensemble
46 (40 members), and GFDL ESM2M large ensemble
47 (30 members). For all ensemble simulations, fully coupled simulations are forced by historical and RCP8.5 scenarios. We used output starting from 1951 because the GFDL large ensemble starts in 1950 and this allows for 1 year of spinup, and ending in 2100 when the GFDL and CESM1 simulations end.
